numbered_ace_sentences: 1. In recent years, many countries have increased wind electricity generation.
2. In recent years, many countries have increased solar electricity generation.
3. The USA leveled out its coal use.
4. The USA decreased its coal use.
5. China significantly increased its coal use.
6. I wonder why wind electricity generation has not drastically increased in the last couple of years.
7. I wonder why solar electricity generation has not drastically increased in the last couple of years.
8. People often say that solar energy is good.
9. People often say that wind power is good.
10. I expected that wind electricity generation would have drastically increased in many places by now.
11. I expected that solar electricity generation would have drastically increased in many places by now.
12. I wonder if some countries are not developed.
13. I wonder if some countries are not financially able.
14. This situation applies to my community.
15. In my community, several areas have many wind turbines.
16. In my community, people try to convert to more solar power.
17. The headline is: Wind to coal, for our energy, what is our main goal?
